document.full_text: egyptians demonstrated on friday demanding that ousted president hosni mubarak and other former officials be put on trial and calling for the ruling army council to end 30 years of emergency law.
document.title: egyptians protest to "protect revolution"
lines_and_colors: egyptians demonstrated on friday demanding that ousted president hosni mubarak and other former officials be put on trial and calling for the ruling army council to end 30 years of emergency law.
